name: Silentnight Ultrabounce Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Comfortable Bouncy Pillows for Stomach, Back and Side Sleepers – Machine Washable and Hypoallergenic Bed Pillows – Pack of 2
review: Ive bought a few diff pillows, trying to get the ''just right'' feeling... These are wonderful, super soft yet a little bouncy.. my neck pain is finally easing after over a year of neck pain, and I know its related to my pillows as I was going to bed ok and each morning... stiff neck and eventually painful.. these are perfect and great value..
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 January 2024
